QuestData.Title: I See Dead People
QuestData.Description: Th... they're ghosts! All of them!$B$BBryan was one of my best friends. Something is clouding his mind; we need to snap him out of it and get to the bottom of this!$B$BHe was always obsessed with his work. Maybe showing him one of his schematics would help. One of the spectral laborers might have one.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve Bryan Finn's Schematic from Spectral Laborers.
QuestData.CompletionText: I'd recognize one of my schematics anywhere.
